body:
So the idea is that bards aa proc all those movement related passives. Ludens echo rapidfire static shivv lich bane dead mans plate. 
This build is actually pretty good because a charged aa deals a lot of dmg and u have a pretty good range because of rapidfire.
Plus all those item give you movement speed so you have a really easy time to land that aa.
You could through in a liandries against tanks.

What you guys think?

Ty i didnt even notice. So build would be ludens rapidfire lich bane mask dead mans plate.

I like the build but its hard to say if its good ,because u just will be like a burst mid champ but u can die pretty fast.
